title: Balancing really needs work.
body:
I just want to preface this post by saying that in 8 years of playing this game, I have never once complained about balancing.  Sure there have been champions that I thought were OP, but never so much so that I was unable to play the game anymore.

The TFT meta is actually awful.  Over half the comps are unplayable because they just can't match up against the good comps.  I personally don't really want to play TFT anymore because I don't really enjoy being forced to play the same 2-3 comps every match.
